    • Method Detail

      • do_array

        public void do_array(int opcode,
            WrappedImage biDst,
            int dstwidth,
            int x,
            int y,
            int cx,
            int cy,
            int[] src,
            int srcwidth,
            int srcx,
            int srcy)
        Perform an operation on a rectangular area of a WrappedImage, using an integer array of colour values as source if necessary
        Parameters:
        opcode - Code defining operation to perform
        biDst - Destination image for operation
        dstwidth - Width of destination image
        x - X-offset of destination area within destination image
        y - Y-offset of destination area within destination image
        cx - Width of destination area
        cy - Height of destination area
        src - Source data, represented as an array of integer pixel values
        srcwidth - Width of source data
        srcx - X-offset of source area within source data
        srcy - Y-offset of source area within source data

      • do_pixel

        public void do_pixel(int opcode,
            WrappedImage dst,
            int x,
            int y,
            int color)
        Perform an operation on a single pixel in a WrappedImage
        Parameters:
        opcode - Opcode defining operation to perform
        dst - Image on which to perform the operation
        x - X-coordinate of pixel to modify
        y - Y-coordinate of pixel to modify
        color - Colour to use in operation (unused for some operations)
